## config-rsbuild-plugin package

A rsbuild plugin for config Lynx Config defined by `@lynx-js/type-config`<!-- -->.

## Example


```ts
import { pluginLynxConfig } from '@lynx-js/config-rsbuild-plugin'
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginLynxConfig({
      enableCheckExposureOptimize: false,
    }),
  ],
})
```

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [pluginLynxConfig(config, options)](./config-rsbuild-plugin.pluginlynxconfig.md) | A rsbuild plugin for config Lynx Config defined by <code>@lynx-js/type-config</code>. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Config](./config-rsbuild-plugin.config.md) | A configuration interface for Lynx Config defined by <code>@lynx-js/type-config</code>. |
|  [Options](./config-rsbuild-plugin.options.md) | Options for the Lynx Config rsbuild plugin. |
